scenario.name: Basic Sipstone UAC
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:AB999747615@p25dr;user=TIA-P25-SG SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] 01.747.AB999.p25dr:[local_port];branch=[branch] To: <sip:AB999747615@p25dr;user=TIA-P25-SG> From: <sip:BEE20052001@p25dr;user=TIA-P25-SG>;tag=[pid][call_number] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 INVITE Contact: <sip:BEE20052001@01.747.AB999.p25dr;user=TIA-P25-SG> Accept: application/sdp;level=1,application/x-tia-p25-issi,application/x-tia-p25-supdat,application/x-tia-p25-issi-90,multipart/mixed Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Priority: 4;a User-Agent: BasicSiptstoneUAC Content-Type: multipart/mixed;boundary="P25 ISSI body boundary" Content-Length: [len]
--P25 ISSI body boundary Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Disposition: session;handling=required
v=0 o=user1 53655765 2353687637 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 100 101 a=rtpmap:100 X-TIA-P25-FullRate/8000 a=rtpmap:101 X-TIA-P25-HalfRate/8000
--P25 ISSI body boundary Content-Type: application/x-tia-p25-issi Content-Disposition: session;handling=required
c-resavail:1 c-protected:0
--P25 ISSI body boundary--

ACK [next_url] SIP/2.0 [routes] Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] 01.747.AB999.p25dr:[local_port];rport;branch=[branch] To: <sip:BEE20052001@p25dr;user=TIA-P25-SG>[peer_tag_param] From: <sip:BEE20052001@p25dr;user=TIA-P25-SG>;tag=[pid][call_number] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 ACK Contact: <sip:BEE20052001@01.747.AB999.p25dr;user=TIA-P25-SG> Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Length: 0

ACK [next_url] SIP/2.0 [routes] Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] 01.747.AB999.p25dr:[local_port];rport;branch=[branch] To: <sip:BEE20052001@p25dr;user=TIA-P25-SG>[peer_tag_param] From: <sip:BEE20052001@p25dr;user=TIA-P25-SG>;tag=[pid][call_number] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 ACK Contact: <sip:BEE20052001@01.747.AB999.p25dr;user=TIA-P25-SG> Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Length: 0
